channel.title: Not letting me get on servers
channel.description: ok i bought a new 4 GB laptop and i wanted to play a server but everytime i click run on the client it closes right away or says it dosnt know "java" i have the newest java downloaded plz help!

item.title: Not letting me get on servers
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

Ok well he means enviromental variables i believe. But the fastest way to fix it is to right click the run.bat, go edit
the type “pause” after all the text, then save it.

Then go into your C:/Program Files/Java/your JRE/bin/, there try to find something called Java.exe, It will the Java Sun Teacup logo thing on it,
Copy that and paste in your server files. Then reply if that doesnt work.

Read full topic
item.source: Not letting me get on servers
